ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly. I live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 I carry my house on my back.

ocean.question: I am a large fish with sharp teeth. People are often scared of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I'm a predator in the ocean.
🎬 Jaws is a movie about me.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. I can squeeze into small spaces. What am I?
I'm a place where sand meets the sea. You might build a sandcastle on me. What am I?
I am a mammal that lives in the ocean and is known for being very smart and friendly. What am I?

hints.text: 🗣️ I communicate with clicks and whistles.
🌊 Flipper is a famous one of my kind.

ocean.question: I am a colorful structure underwater, made by tiny animals. Many fish live near me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I support a lot of marine life.
🤿 You can explore me while diving.

ocean.question: I am a very large whale with baleen plates instead of teeth. I filter feed tiny creatures. What am I?

hints.text: 🐋 I am one of the largest animals on Earth.

ocean.question: I am a strong, circular current in the ocean, often caused by wind patterns. I can affect weather. What am I?

hints.text: 🔄 I move heat around the globe.

ocean.question: I am the deepest part of the ocean. It's very cold and dark here, with immense pressure. What am I?

hints.text: ⚙️ Special equipment is needed to explore me.

ocean.question: I am a floating mass of ice, broken off from a glacier or ice sheet. I am a hazard to ships. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 Only a small part of me is visible above water.

food.question: I am yellow and curved. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 📏 I can be measured in inches
☀️ My color is associated with sunshine

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me. What am I?
I am orange and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥗 Can be eaten raw or cooked

food.question: I am round and red. I grow on trees and keep the doctor away. What am I?

hints.text: 🥧 Can be made into a pie

food.question: I am long and green. I am often in a salad. What am I?

hints.text: 🥪 Can be found in a sandwich

food.question: I am small and round, and come in many colors. I grow in bunches on a vine. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I need lots of sunshine to grow
🧪 Scientists can create seedless varieties of me

food.question: I'm a seed inside a pod, that's often green. You might eat me with rice or in a soup, I'm a type of?

hints.text: 🟢 Often appears during St. Patrick's Day
🍲 Added to many dishes to give flavor

food.question: I am a fruit that is also a color. My name sounds like something you might drink. What am I?

hints.text: 🥤 I can be made into a juice
🌎 I am named after a fruit

food.question: I am a vegetable that looks like a tiny tree. Some people love me, some people hate me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 You can steam me or roast me
🥦 I am green and have florets

food.question: I'm a savory paste made of ground sesame seeds. I'm often in hummus or baba ghanoush. What am I?

hints.text: 🌍 My name is derived from an Arabic word
